name: The Opening Scene from Torque (2004): The Video Game
name_original: The Opening Scene from Torque (2004): The Video Game
description:
From the creators behind the hits like Trash Bot Rampage and KoolSkaterz gives you The Opening Scene from Torque: The Video Game. Ever wanted to fuck the Acura RSX and Mitsubishi Eclipse in the ass on your bicycle in video game format? Well now you can, in this repackage of modified KoolSkaterz physics. Beat the cars in their race on the generic desert to remind them that "CARS STINK". Also you can honk your horn with the left click button..... that's cool.......
